knimeNode.name: STTS Filter
knimeNode.shortDescription: Filters terms with certain STTS tags.

fullDescription.intro:
Filters all terms that don't have the specified STTS tags assigned. The terms are filtered out of the bag of words and the documents as well if deep preprocessing is checked.
A term is kept if at least one of the specified STTS tags is assigned. If strict filtering is set, all specified STTS tags have to be assigned to a term.

tab.name: Preprocessing options
tab.option: If strict filtering is checked, all specified STTS tags have to be applied to the terms. Otherwise at least one of the specified tags has to be applied to the terms.
If checked, terms which have the specified tags are filtered, otherwise they are kept. If strict filtering is checked, all tags must match to filter or keep a term.

tab.name: Deep preprocessing options
tab.option: If deep preprocessing is checked, the terms contained inside the documents are preprocessed too, this means that the documents themselves are changed too, which is more time consuming.
Specifies the column containing the documents to preprocess.

If checked, the documents contained in the specified "Original Document column" are appended unchanged even if deep preprocessing is checked. This helps to keep the original documents in the output data table without the agonizing pain of joining.
Specifies the column containing the original documents which can be attached unchanged.
If checked unmodifiable terms will be preprocessed too.

inPort.name: Terms and related documents input table

ports.inPort: The input table which contains the terms to filter.

outPort.name: Filtered terms and related documents output table

ports.outPort: The output table which contains the preprocessed terms.
